title: Meet the incredible shrinking middle-aged men
text:
As a glut of celebrity men slim down, Gavin Newsham reveals his own weighty issues

It was on a Normandy beach this summer when it finally dawned on me that I had to lose some weight. “Take your top off,” said my wife, as she pointed to the sun disappearing behind a dirty grey cloud.

I made my excuses – something about not wanting to get burnt on such a gloriously overcast day – but the truth is I was both embarrassed and scared; embarrassed as to how I could get to nearly 50 and look the way I do and scared that if I did remove my shirt there was every chance a group of concerned onlookers might just join forces and try to roll me back into the sea.
